summary: Request for a metric meter abstraction in the Ruby SDK that can be accessed from the runtime, activities, and workflows for collecting and reporting application metrics.
userImpact: Users cannot currently collect and track application metrics from within Temporal Ruby SDK applications, limiting observability and debugging capabilities.
proposedFix: Implement a metric meter abstraction accessible from runtime, activities, and workflows
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented and closed; buffer implementation was moved to separate issue #176
keyQuote: Need metric meter abstraction (i.e. accessible from runtime or activities or workflows)
